api.name: getLatestNews
api.description: Get the latest crypto news from all major sources. Returns headlines from CoinDesk, The Block, Decrypt, CoinTelegraph, Bitcoin Magazine, Blockworks, and The Defiant.

limit.description: Number of articles to return (default: 10, max: 50)

source.description: Filter by specific source: 'coindesk', 'theblock', 'decrypt', 'cointelegraph', 'bitcoinmagazine', 'blockworks', 'defiant' (optional, returns all if not specified)

api.name: searchNews
api.description: Search crypto news for specific topics or keywords. Searches headlines and descriptions across all sources.

keywords.description: Comma-separated keywords to search for (e.g., 'ethereum,eth,vitalik' or 'bitcoin,etf,sec')

limit.description: Number of articles to return (default: 10, max: 30)

api.name: getDefiNews
api.description: Get DeFi-specific news from The Defiant and other DeFi-focused outlets. Includes yield farming, DEX, lending, and protocol news.

api.name: getBitcoinNews
api.description: Get Bitcoin-specific news and analysis from Bitcoin Magazine and other sources. Includes halving, mining, Lightning Network, and ordinals news.

api.name: getBreakingNews
api.description: Get breaking news and market-moving headlines from the last 2 hours.

api.name: getSources
api.description: List all available news sources with their current status.

meta.title: Crypto News
meta.description: Aggregated crypto news from CoinDesk, The Block, Decrypt, CoinTelegraph, Bitcoin Magazine, Blockworks, and The Defiant. 100% free, no API keys required.
